document_data.name: Loving Pain
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Loving pain''''' was a [[Loviatan]] healing spell that caused intense pain in the recipient.

It was often used by [[cleric]]s of [[Loviatar]] to heal themselves of the wounds they acquired during their rituals.
document_data.Effects:
When this spell was cast, a single individual was healed of some of their wounds. They were also inflicted with a tremendous amount of pain, to the point they were left writhing and yelling out in agony.

The spell had no effect on creatures that did not have a nervous system.
document_data.History: ''Loving pain'' was one of the spells whose specifications could be found within the ''[[Lash of Loviatar]]''.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required a single drop of ''[[unholy water]]'' and the cleric's [[holy symbol]].
